content: This helps keep the table much clearer. I don't have to worry nearly as badly about party fowls or keeping up with sheets and Journaling
I don't like this is still missing items from the game. No Viking class and no blade boot for example. Another thing I wish they had was the ability to add custom gear.

This makes things so much easier its amazing. Idk how it works completely yet but so far it helps alot. Id say the only thing that bugs me is no artificer class but I was happy to be able to add it in.
Best app I've used so far! Will there be spells from the spell compendium added, or the alternate classes from 3.5 PHB2?
Love the app, but would you guys mind adding the Spiritualist Class in the next update?
The app is great for building characters and keeps track of tons of info for you. Its also constantly updated!
Easily the best character sheet app, loved it and used it on apple for years ( only reason i owned an ipad mini was for this app) so glad it's finally on android.

So far so good. Beats having to print ou charactersheets over and over. That being said I deducted one star due to the lack of the archetype "master if many styles" for the monk. I noticed all other UC archs are in there but not that, in the expansion pack as well.
Super user friendly, especially for new players, only wish it supported a dark mode

App is very well put together. From step by step level-ups to adding custom items, races, and classes; everything integrates very well. Great for newer players still learning the basics, but flexible enough for veteran players who may need something more custom. It's well worth the money, and the extra few dollars for the Pathfinder expansion gets you A LOT of content so you don't need to add everything manually. Cannot recommend enough.

This seems to be a good app. However, when adding a custom race there is no field for racial hit dice, only level adjustment. This leaves the hit points, skill points, feats and BAB off-kilter. It seems like kind of a big miss for such an otherwise detailed app. I would be happy to give 5 stars if a hit die field were added in that adjusted for these things.

I really love this app! I have been using it for a few years now and I was excited to see it reach the Google App store. The one issue I ran into is when using a Chromebook the import files do not appear when selecting "Import" within the app after exporting characters. I figured it was an issue with hidden files but this was not the case.

App is very fluid and easy to use, however, it is missing a ton of stuff for PF. There is no Devoted Muse prestige class, and a lot of feats are missing, like Fey Foundling. There is also no way to add traits either. Also, I wish there was an option for gestalt characters too, but it's not a big deal.
Amazing and I'm sure you will have fun with it
My only complaint so far is that I can't seem to adjust the strength rating on the composite longbow nor the composite shortbow. As soon as that is fixed, instant five stars.
replyContent: Hi, we will fix it in the next update. Thanks for using our app. :)

content: This app is legendary, and a great resource for a player or DM of any stage. My only complaint is that I can't seem to find an option to create homebrew races or classes, which is typically something me and my players love doing. Can't wait to see what more updates come out in the future!
replyContent: Hi! It is possible to add custom races and classes in the Database section of the app e.g.: character list screen -> Database -> Pathfinder -> Classes -> Jump to Custom -> Add Custom. Thanks for your review :)

content: This is the best and most cohesive app I have ever seen for building and managing my character sheets in PF! Would be 5 stars, but there doesn't seem to be any equipment options for buying a backpack or masterwork backpack. Also when building my feral gnasher goblin, his savage bite (special feat) doesn't adjust his bite attack from 1d4 to 1d6, as it is supposed to. Please fix! Thank you!
Refunded, if I had realized it was going to ask for another $6 to make any class aside from the core classes I wouldn't have spent the money.
This app is just amazing. Does everything so well. Highly recomended.
Nice, finally a complete path 1 with customisation, now the pain of remaking my 4 lvl 16 character step by step, at least it will be easier for my next one
replyContent: Hi! There is a character creation mode designed to make it easier to make higher-level characters. Just select 'Enter Existing Character' instead of 'New Character'. This way you don't have to perform multiple level-ups. Thanks for downloading and rating our app :)

content: Some minor issues, but besides that fantastic
I've been using the app on iOS for a while and I am so happy to have it on my phone now!!

Excellent character creation App, best I've found. Grateful that you'll added it to android. Didn't want to have to buy an Apple tablet. I did find a bug. Not letting me pick which ring finger to use.

This is easily the best TTRPG out there and well worth the money for the base app and the Pathfinder expansion if thats the version you play. I learned of the app last year through my cousin when he got me into D&D and he recommended that I use this because it makes building and leveling characters laughably easy. When I switched to Android last June I was disappointed that the app was not available here but that has now changed. I can 100% guarantee you will think this app is worth every penny.

I rarely write reviews but this app is well worth the money, I've been looking for an app for dnd 3.5 and it has every aspect you'll need, even for pathfinder. I highly recommend this app if you can spare a few bucks.

Great to have, just needs a bit more flexibility with adding custom content (and a dark mode). The app is consistently updated with new archetypes and classes so the expansion pack is definitely worth it (I'm talking about pathfinder no clue about 3.5)

Excellent app for 3.5e and Pathfinder 1e. In terms of Paizo content, Pathbuilder is better for PF1e however this supports custom classes which Pathbuilder does not. It's 3.5e support is top notch with no comparable app afaik. My only complaint is that I don't see a way within the Pathfinder side of things to change the damage type of a custom weapon (for context, Mystic Bolts on a Warlock Vigilante).

This App is amazing for all things Pathfinder first edition! All the math is done for you and is done accurately. Often times it will properly add bonuses that I forget about. Character creation is super easy and so are level ups. Most magic items are perfectly integrated and all of the rules are right on the app. The best part is that if something isn't quite working right or you have something hombrewed it is amazingly easy to add in. I really enjoy using and would highly recommend this app!
